directions: In a medium bowl, use a whisk to thoroughly combine the cheese, crème fraîche, olive oil, vinegar, and garlic. Alternatively, place everything into a jar, seal the lid, and shake vigorously to combine. Taste with a leaf of lettuce, then add salt and adjust acid as needed.Refrigerate leftovers, covered, for up to 3 days.Ideal for Belgian endive, chicories, Iceberg wedges, Little Gem and romainelettuce. This dressing also works beautifully as sauce for steak or dip for carrots and cucumbers.
